akn:section.akn:heading: Preferential tuition for District of Columbia residents.

akn:content.akn:p: The Board of Trustees shall, in accordance with § 38-1205.06(c)(7) [repealed], fix tuition to allow bona fide residents of the District of Columbia to attend the School of Law on a preferential tuition basis.

An applicant for preferential tuition shall make a showing of the applicant’s bona fide residence in the District of Columbia.
